result.execSummary:
The defendant Joseph Ryan Binkowski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joseph Ryan Binkowski is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joseph Ryan Binkowski was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: To be paid in installments of $100.00 per month commencing 06-01-2015 and the first of each month thereafter until paid in full.  Ordered bond be applied.
15 days in the Pepin County Jail commencing 05-12-2015 at 6:00 p.m. with work release.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph Ryan Binkowski

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Joseph Ryan Binkowski in court with attorney Haley Breese Wright.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads no contest to count 2.  Court reviews PLQ/WOR form.  Court finds defendant guilty on Count 2,  Count 1 DRI.  Sentenced to 15 days in the PCJ com. 5/12 @ 6 p.m.  with credit 1 day served; pay costs $443; apply bond.  TTP $100/mo. com. 6/1/15.  Advised of appeal rights.

Defendant Joseph Ryan Binkowski in court with attorney Haley Breese Wright.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel informs court of resolution & joint recommendation of plea to count 2 with 15 days jail, 1 night credit, count 1 DRI.

Defendant Joseph Ryan Binkowski in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Waters informs the court an offer was made unacceptable to his client.  Requests to withdraw as counsel.  Court allows Mr. Waters to withdraw as long SPD appoints a new attorney or defendant to hire his own attorney.  Status conference scheduled for April 21, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Joseph Ryan Binkowski in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorneys have had preliminary discussions, request return 4/7.  Status conference scheduled for April 7, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Joseph Ryan Binkowski in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Judge advises defendant of charges/max. penalties and rights.  NGP entered.  Status conference scheduled for March 17, 2015 at 02:30 pm.  Notice provided to parties.
